name: Operation Cost Distribution
query:
select max(date(tsd.to_time)) as 'Date::100', ts.production_order as 'Order::120', 
sum(ts.total_hours*tsd.hour_rate_electricity) as 'Electricity:Currency:100', sum(ts.total_hours*tsd.hour_rate_gas) as 'Gas:Currency:100', 
sum(ts.total_hours*tsd.hour_rate_water) as 'Water:Currency:100', sum(ts.total_hours*tsd.hour_rate_labour) as 'Labour:Currency:100', 
sum(ts.total_hours*tsd.hour_rate_rent) as 'Rent:Currency:100', sum(ts.total_hours*tsd.hour_rate_consumable) as 'Consumable:Currency:100'
from `tabTimesheet Detail` tsd 
left join `tabTimesheet` ts on ts.name=tsd.parent
where not isnull(ts.production_order) and ts.docstatus=1 and ts.company=%(company)s and ts.business_unit=%(business_unit)s and tsd.to_time>=%(from_date)s and tsd.to_time<=%(to_date)s
group by production_order
order by tsd.to_time
